application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: Back Garden (Centre) T1: Gingko tree - Reduce height by 1.5 metres through selective thinning, reduce sides to balance canopy and maintain an even shape, thin canopy by 10%, remove old vine in centre, clear section from neighbour's by 1.5 metres to prevent vine climbing across, remove major deadwood Height 8m and spread 5m. Reduce height to 6.5m and spread to 4.5m(Back Boundary) T2: Elderberry tree - Cut section by 1 metre to clear vine thin canopy by 10%, remove major deadwood Height 5m and spread 5m. Reduce height to 5m and spread to 4mT3: Silver birch tree - Reduce height by 1 - 1.5 metres, lightly prune sides to shape Height 7m and spread 2m. Reduce height to 5.5m and spread to 1.9m (Right Boundary) T4: Olive tree - Reduce height by 1 metre, reduce sides to balance canopy and maintain an even shapeHeight 4m and spread 2m. Reduce height to 3.5m and spread to 1.8m
decision_conditions: Works agreed to tree labelled T1
Works agreed to tree labelled T4
Works agreed to tree labelled T3
Works agreed to tree labelled T2
